John Rugoiyo Gichuki bụ onye nkuzi na onye edemede na Kenya

O meriri asọmpi BBC's African Playwriting nke afọ 2006 site na egwuregwu ya Eternal, Forever, na asọmpi BBC's African Performance playwriting n'afọ 2004 site na egwuregwu ya A Time for Cleansing, egwuregwu banyere mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị na ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Rwanda.
Archived from the original on 23 December 2010.
